body: This +2 hide armor is made from rhinoceros hide. In addition to granting a +2 enhancement bonus to AC, it has a –1 armor check penalty and deals an additional 2d6 points of damage on any successful charge attack made by the wearer, including a mounted charge.
name: Rhino Hide
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Specific Magic Armor and Shields/Specific Magic Armor/Rhino Hide
